text: The Big Trail is a 1930 American romantic western movie directed by Raoul Walsh and starring John Wayne, Marguerite Churchill, Tyrone Power, Sr., El Brendel, Tully Marshall, Frederick Burton, Ian Keith. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1930 movies Category:1930s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Raoul Walsh Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Missouri
title: The Big Trail
